x11.Xproto



struct xConnClientPrefix;
connection setup structure. This is followed by numRoots xWindowRoot structs.

struct xTimecoord;
Structure Defns Structures needed for replies

struct xGenericReply;
XRep:
meant to be 32 byte quantity

struct xError;
Xerror All errors are 32 bytes

struct _xEvent;
xEvent All events are 32 bytes

struct xGenericEvent;
Generic event

Those events are not part of the core protocol spec and can be used by various extensions. type is always GenericEvent extension is the minor opcode of the extension the event belongs to. evtype is the actual event type, unique _per extension__.

GenericEvents can be longer than 32 bytes, with the length field specifying the number of 4 byte blocks after the first 32 bytes.

struct _xReq;
REQUESTS

struct xResourceReq;
structures that follow request.
